<question>
A <LU LEMMA="monochromatic" CAT="A">monochromatic</LU> <LU LEMMA="light" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">light</LU> <LU LEMMA="source" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">source</LU> throws <LU LEMMA="light" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">light</LU> to the <LU LEMMA="screen" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">screen</LU> with an <LU LEMMA="aperture" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">aperture</LU>. <LU LEMMA="Fresnel" CAT="N" DRV="POSESSIVE" FLX="TABLE" TYPE="Prop" Nb="s">Fresnel</LU> <LU LEMMA="diffraction" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">diffraction</LU> by a <LU LEMMA="round" CAT="A">round</LU> <LU LEMMA="aperture" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">aperture</LU> is observed on the 2nd <LU LEMMA="screen" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">screen</LU>. Choose all <LU LEMMA="possible" CAT="A">possible</LU> <LU LEMMA="number" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="p">numbers</LU> of the observed <LU LEMMA="pattern" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">pattern</LU> given an <LU LEMMA="odd" CAT="A">odd</LU> <LU LEMMA="number" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">number</LU> of <LU LEMMA="Fresnel" CAT="N" DRV="POSESSIVE" FLX="TABLE" TYPE="Prop" Nb="s">Fresnel</LU> <LU LEMMA="zone" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="p">zones</LU> <LU LEMMA="open" CAT="A">open</LU>.
</question>
<answers>
<answer right="no">	1 </answer>
<answer right="yes">2 </answer>
<answer right="no">	3 </answer>
<answer right="no">	4 </answer>
<answer right="no">	5 </answer>
